title: Help! What typeface is used on Edition Peters covers?
content:
[http://www.phaidon.com/resource/johncage4-620x467.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016212323/http:/www.phaidon.com/resource/johncage4-620x467.jpg "http://www.phaidon.com/resource/johncage4-620x467.jpg")

What is the font used for the composers name (in this case "John Cage")??

Thanks so much for your help!!!
author: brodyalbert

comments.content: That is a custom font of their own called 'Peters Editions'.
thank you so much! I will look into the alternatives.
@Nick Cook.. Is it possible to get the 'Peters Editions' font?
No it isn't. I digitised it a few years ago for Peters Editions. I think this example is before the work I did - from what I remember it was more condensed than this.
